author: guitargeek
body:
Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/25293 plus changes to make Photon MVA V2 work before https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/24131 and adapting to new weights files names.

__Has to be tested with__ cms-sw/cmsdist#4518
title: [10_2_X] Egamma Fall17 V2 Photon IDso
